segments.text: I think about how easy it is for accidents to happen in places like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task that she misses all the signs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the kids working together, but part of me feels disgusted by their sneaky antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies should be enjoyed together, not stolen away like a crime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is a growing hazard, and she seems oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The image of the open window with the garden outside feels like a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost as if the calm outside is mocking the chaos brewing inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
